item.description:
The Stafford Springs Arts Commission presents their free concert series/

This week's performers: Blues/Rock with Lucky 13
http://www.lucky13.fm...

Concerts are held at Heritage Park, which is on Route 190 just north of downtown -- if heading north, look for the gazebo on your left.

In case of rain, concerts are moved indoors to the senior center, 3 Buckley Highway (Route 190), Stafford Springs.

There is plenty of room for picnic on the grass -- be aware there are no bathroom facilities.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Free Concert at Heritage Park in Stafford Springs
